senses.sense_definition: To adapt a word from a foreign language by changing it to fit the native language's form or structure.

examples.text: Linguists often <w>paronymize</w> borrowed terms to make them easier for native speakers to pronounce.
The author decided to <w>paronymize</w> the French title rather than keeping the original spelling.

senses.sense_definition: To convert a word into a paronym.

examples.text: The exercise required students to <w>paronymize</w> the root word into several related adjectives.
It is difficult to <w>paronymize</w> this noun without changing its fundamental meaning.
